quote: The field of consciousness is tiny. It accepts only one problem at a time. Get into a fist fight  put your mind on the strategy of the fight  and you will not feel the other fellow's punches.
quote_letters: THE FIELD OF CONSCIOUSNESS IS TINY IT ACCEPTS ONLY ONE PROBLEM AT A TIME GET INTO A FIST FIGHT  PUT YOUR MIND ON THE STRATEGY OF THE FIGHT  AND YOU WILL NOT FEEL THE OTHER FELLOWS PUNCHES
